TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool UnhandledExceptionHandler(object sender, Exception ex);
.class public auto ansi sealed UnhandledExceptionHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function UnhandledExceptionHandler(sender As Object, ex As Exception) As Boolean
public delegate bool UnhandledExceptionHandler(System::Object ^ sender, Exception ^ ex);

Docs.param: The 'this' pointer value when the exception was caught.
Docs.summary: Delegate for possibly handling an exception in the application.
Docs.returns: True if the exception was handled. A return value of false will cause the exception to be re-thrown.
